services.title: SolidWorks Training
services.shortDescription: Industry focussed SOLIDWORKS training programs aligned with global certifications
services.fullDescription: Our comprehensive SolidWorks training program is designed for both beginners and professionals looking to enhance their CAD skills. Learn from certified instructors with real-world industry experience.
benefits: Increase your employability in design engineering
services.metaTitle: SolidWorks Training Courses - Expert-Led CAD Training | CAB Authorized
services.metaDescription: Learn SolidWorks from industry experts. Comprehensive training courses for beginners to advanced users. Hands-on projects, certification, and job placement assistance.

services.title: Placement
services.shortDescription: Career oriented training combined with placement support
services.fullDescription: Our placement services bridge the gap between talented engineers and leading companies. We provide comprehensive support including resume building, interview preparation, and direct connections with hiring companies.
services.metaTitle: Engineering Placement Services - Career Support | CAB Authorized
services.metaDescription: Expert placement services for design engineers. Connect with 100+ top companies, get resume support, interview prep, and career guidance. Start your engineering career today.

services.title: Design Services and Manpower Supply
services.shortDescription: Professional 3D design, CAD/CAM job work and design manpower supply services for mechanical and industrial projects.
services.fullDescription: We provide skilled design engineering professionals and comprehensive outsourcing solutions to help your business scale efficiently. Our vetted engineers bring expertise in CAD, product design, and manufacturing.
services.metaTitle: Design Services & Engineering Manpower Solutions | CAB Authorized
services.metaDescription: Professional design engineering manpower and outsourcing services. Skilled CAD engineers, product design, 2D/3D conversion. Flexible solutions for your business needs.
